casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

98-2225. State v. Jeffers.

Hamilton App. No. C-980150. Discretionary appeal allowed; sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 98-1779, State v. Conyers, Lucas App. No. L-97-1327, and 98-1929, State v. Schultz, Hamilton App. No. C-970954; briefing schedule stayed.
